attributes.action: MPs explain how the PM resigning changes the impact of the deal for the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Guardian report of Conservative MPs stating that they would change their vote following announcement that PM May would step down if deal passed

https://www.theguardian.com/politics/2019/mar/27/theresa-may-to-resign-before-next-phase-of-brexit
attributes.background:
Several MPs have changed their stated position on how they would vote for PM May's Brexit deal, seemingly only related to PM May agreeing to step down should the deal be passed.
How does the PM resigning change the deal's impact on the UK economy. Seems like straight politics rather than economics

rejection.details: This would be a matter for individual MPs rather than the Government or Parliament as a whole.
